name: Empire Fable
description:
EMPIRE FABLE
Welcome to the world of Empire Fable. A Fable like 2D RPG. Plunge your self into an epic world of dungeon delving and gold piece looting. Discover new weapons and armor to equip your avatar. While exploring fantasy towns, dungeons and forests. Enjoy the hand drawn art and sprites. Controls:
Arrow Keys Up.Down,Left,Right control movement Left Mouse button attacks. Game Highlights:
Explore a Fantasy World.
Free to Play Online No Downloads
Hire Henchmen.
Loot Monsters.
Dungeon Dive.
Hand Drawn Art Work.

Play the FREE HTML5 web based game Empire Fable here. http://www.empirefable.com

Official Site:   

http://www.empirefable.com
